GSD.description:
tcp: annotate data-race around tcp_md5sig_pool_populated

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.4.220 by commit 42d579d91051e6beb5ece8f9baa17712f56b558c. For more details please see the references link.
